description:
Active@ UNDELETE helps you to recover deleted files and restore deleted partitions from a variety of file systems such as FAT, NTFS, NTFS + EFS, MacOS HFS+, ApFS, Linux ext2, ext3, ext4, ZFS, Unix UFS.

Active@ UNDELETE helps you to recover deleted files and restore deleted partitions from a variety of file systems such as FAT, NTFS, NTFS + EFS, MacOS HFS+, ApFS, Linux ext2, ext3, ext4, ZFS, Unix UFS. Advanced scan algorithms help to restore files even from severely damaged disks. Sophisticated user-friendly UI makes navigation through your data a breeze.
